definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: When I was at college, I met my ex-wife.
sentences.chinese: 我是上大学时认识我的前妻的。

sentences.english: Mahone calls his ex-wife Pam in Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 马宏与他在科罗拉多州的前妻通了电话。

sentences.english: He had one child, who is, of course, with his ex-wife.
sentences.chinese: 他刚离异，一个孩子自然跟了前妻。

sentences.english: Here he is, sending a birthday card to his ex-wife, yet now he’s with his former [FBI] colleague [Felicia Lang].
sentences.chinese: 他给前妻寄一张生日卡，和他以前的同事成了一对儿。

sentences.english: Havin' a little trouble with the ex-wife?
I didn't want to talk about my ex-wife.
She hates himself, why to dig three feet again to the ex-wife back?
sentences.chinese: 她恨死本人了，为什么要再掘地三尺把前妻找回来？

sentences.english: I forewarned him of the trouble that would arise if he showed up at his ex-wife's house.
sentences.chinese: 我预先警告过他出现在他前妻那里会引起的麻烦。

sentences.english: Xuan gave his ex-wife half of their property, and she got custody of their child.
sentences.chinese: 宣分给他的前妻一半财产，还把孩子的监护权给了她。

sentences.english: That told us that Ross' ex-wife wanted to marry her best friend.
sentences.chinese: 这一集讲的是罗斯的前妻想要跟她最好的朋友结婚。

sentences.english: STOCK SPLIT-When your ex-wife and her lawyer split your assets equally between themselves.
sentences.chinese: 当离婚时，前妻与律师对你资产所采的行动。

sentences.english: He said he was framed by his ex-wife.
sentences.chinese: 他说他受到了前妻的诬陷。

sentences.english: He has another two children with his ex-wife, Samantha Lewes.
sentences.chinese: 他与前妻萨蔓莎也生有两个孩子。
你是怎么遇到你的前妻的？

sentences.english: Maybe you're still hung up on your ex-wife.
sentences.chinese: 也许你心里还挂念着你前妻呢。

sentences.english: Xiao Chen's ex-wife has also expressed her wish to return to him.
sentences.chinese: 而陈景的前妻也向小陈表达了破镜重圆的意愿。

definition: derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
mistress/the other woman (coll.)/grade 3 in elementary school
